##  Utilizing encryption and decryption to send files

[Project Link](https://github.com/lehig/Hello-World/tree/main/SendAFile)

This project uses C# as its only language. It also uses a couple of libraries that 
create sockets that then are used to send and recieve files locally from computer to 
computer. This program also gives the option of using encryption on a file and then 
decrypting that file. 

## Utilizing GopenPGP and AWS S3 Buckets

[Project Link](https://github.com/lehig/gpg-privacy)

This project uses Go as its only language. This uses the common GopenPGP library. This 
program can receive a file, encrypt that file with the specified public key of 
the recipient, send the file to an S3 bucket, then can be retrieved and decrypted 
using the public and private key of the recipient.
